requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3rd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics 4000, or dedicated GPU NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended to play on 4k. If you do, lower the screen percentage setting in the Options>Graphics menu in game to a lower percent if experiencing lag.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 4.0 GHz
  • Graphics: dedicated GPU NVIDIA GeForce 1080GTX or AMD Radeon RX Vega 64 series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended to play on 4k. If you do, lower the screen percentage setting in the Options>Graphics menu in game to a lower percent if experiencing lag.
